title: Caregiver health monitoring as part of care recipient's care plan
description: Caregiver health monitoring as part of care recipient's care plan
content:
Scenario: Caregiver health monitoring as part of care recipient's care plan
    Given James's health directly affects his ability to care for David
    And caregiver health collapse creates patient crisis
    When the healthcare_elohim monitors caregiver health
    Then James's health should be tracked as part of care plan
    And providers should ask about caregiver well-being
    And caregiver health problems should trigger intervention
    And James should be required to attend his own medical appointments
    And healthcare system should recognize caregiver health as patient health infrastructure
